title: Pope Francis decries 'shipwreck of civilization' as he visits refugees on Greek island of Lesbos
content:
1. Pope Francis decries 'shipwreck of civilization' as he visits refugees on Greek island of Lesbos  CNN
  2. Pope Francis warns of 'retreat from democracy' during Greece visit  New York Post
  3. Pope Francis, visiting Greek razor wire-fenced migrant camp, challenges Europe to live up to its human rights ideals  The Washington Post
  4. Orthodox priest shouts 'Pope, you are a heretic' at Francis in Athens  Reuters
  5. Shipwreck of civilization: Pope comforts migrants on Lesbos  Associated Press
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 教皇フランシスコ、ギリシャのレスボス島で難民を訪問し「文明の難破」を批判
教皇方济各在访问希腊莱斯博斯岛的难民时谴责 "文明的沉船"。
教皇方濟各在訪問希臘萊斯博斯島的難民時譴責 "文明的沉船"。
